data.message: one of my friend has lost access to his account and email too. then how can he get back  access his facebook id by verifying  passport id  for identification? or how can i contacat with facebook without login to facebook or by e-mail? is there any way?

replies.message: Hi Maksudul. Your friend may be able to confirm his identity by submitting his ID here: http://bit.ly/2wM5ovO. -Elizabeth
hey, the same thing happened to me. could you get back your friend to facebook? Please help me:/
I did n't try that. cause till now he don't give me any official id. you can try by the link given above.
